feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for all portal pages.
frontend/src/components/CustomerOrderPro: Progress indicator showing current order step with labels and bars.
frontend/src/components/DishImageModal.t: Modal displaying enlarged dish image with close controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing project text, attribution link, and copyright year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation buttons and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating queries on change.
Hook managing 4â€‘step customer flow, cart state, totals, and order placement.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence. Wraps AuthClient setup with configurable options and exposes status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderTracking.ts: Provides a hook that simulates order status progression over time using timers. Supports starting, resetting, and tracking the current step of an order.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are unused due to a mock backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes. Applies global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root and wraps it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutProject.tsx: Displays an overview of the food ordering system with feature cards and project details. Focuses on UI demonstration and conceptual backend explanation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Implements a multi-step customer ordering flow with menu browsing, cart management, details form, and simulated order tracking. Integrates order state from custom hooks and renders step-specific UI.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryPortal.tsx: Provides a UI-only delivery partner dashboard with login simulation and status updates for sample delivery orders. Allows marking orders as picked up or delivered with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page showing hero text and cards linking to customer, restaurant, and delivery portals.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantPortal.tsx: Restaurant portal with a login screen and a dashboard to view, accept, or reject sample orders, plus menu management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/Technologies.tsx: Technologies page listing frontend, backend, database, and tooling stacks with categorized cards and descriptions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the food ordering system frontend.
